text_block_list.text: Hey, Kris S! Have you tried the dango? I've already had five! They're so darn chewy, I just can't stooop!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
You eatin' your fill, Rob Roy? 
You need to eat a whole lot and recharge~!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
Y-yes! I've had some of the dango. 
It's cute how they look like little bunnies.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Very good! You made a nice hustle training and filled your belly... So we got you one last thing, for a job well done!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
It's a present from both of us! 
A hammer for your shoes!!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
And―― another gift. 
――Records of our recent training.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text: You worked super, DUPER hard, and made a big jump in such a short time!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
You're fit as a fiddle for the fall season! 
I just know you're gonna win it all!
text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle

text_block_list.text:
――Take this to heart ―― and move forward. 
You can―― do it.
text_block_list.name: Symboli Kris S

text_block_list.text:
...Of course!! 
Thank you. I won't let you down...!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Last mission... 
Neo Universe will "transfer"...
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Having a good time, Universe?
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
You've done a lot leading up to now. 
So let me give you a reward.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
One... 
Two... 
Three.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text: ...A 『shoe care tool』?
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
You've gotten to learn a lot about it firsthand. 
The joy of "telling" someone your feelings.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text: ――Always remember that joy.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
You're a girl who can "tell" and "connect". 
This is proof. 
...Take good care of it.
text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki

text_block_list.text:
...Affirmative. Fuji Kiseki repaired the "terminated" connection. 
Our "space sign". So...――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
"Mutev."... 
『Thank you』, Fuji Kiseki.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
――"Downlink", "downlink". 
"GRSS"... The [*sky*] will 『connect』 too――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: ――Uni-san!
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
So this is where you were! 
...What are you doing?
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
『Watching』 the [*sky*]. 
The same [*world*] as Zenno Rob Roy. And――
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Last mission. 
Neo Universe wanted to『give』this 『shoe care tool』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
Ah... For me...? 
――Thank you so much. I'll use it with care.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Zenno Rob Roy. Look.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
The sky... The moon is beautiful tonight. 
It's as if it's completely full.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Mmhm. This "observation" of the [*sky*]... is "shared". 
Because Zenno Rob Roy "tried".
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: Ah...
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
(――The world I've never known. The world as Uni-san sees it. 
The world I've always wanted to see. 
Am I, however slightly... sharing it with her?)
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Uni-san... 
I've always wanted to see this sky.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text: Sphira. We overcame a "distance" of "4.2 light years", and『connected』.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text: ――Yes. I'm sphira too.
text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy

text_block_list.text:
Boop boop. 
Boop beep boop boop. 
Beep boop beep beep.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe

text_block_list.text:
『I』『L』『Y』 
――"Transmission" complete.
text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
